topic.name: Polymers (Plastics)
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Polymers (Plastics) in Design & Technology

objectives.objective_text: Identify colored plastic.
Name soft and hard plastic.
Identify UV stabilizers (stops sun damage).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Identify a shape made by a mold.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Name 3D printing.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the 'sprue' mark on a plastic kit.
Identify plastic litter.
Name recycling bins.
Identify single-use plastics.
Identify plastic bottles and toys.
Name plastic as something that melts when hot.
Identify Acrylic (clear like glass).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Identify hard plastic that doesn't melt (like a plug).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Name glue that dries hard.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Identify Melamine (plates/cups).
Recall that we can change how plastic looks.
Observe glow-in-the-dark plastic.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that machines make toys.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Observe playdough being pushed through a shape (extrusion).
Recall that plastic stays forever.
Observe biodegradable bags.
Recall that we can recycle some plastics.
Observe that plastic comes in many colors.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that once it is set, it stays that shape.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a kitchen worktop surface.
Explain the recycling symbol numbers.
Summarize that we add things to plastic to change it.
Explain pigments (color).
Explain Anti-static additives.
Defend the chemical modification of polymers for performance.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize Vacuum Forming (sucking plastic over a shape).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Explain Injection Moulding (squirting hot plastic into a mold).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Explain Rotational Moulding.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the choice of process based on production volume.
Summarize the 'Pacific Garbage Patch'.
Explain Bioplastics (made from corn/plants).
Explain the microplastic problem.
Defend the reduction of virgin plastic use.
Summarize that Thermoplastics can be melted and reshaped again.
Explain PLA (polylactic acid) used in 3D printing.
Defend the use of thermoplastics for recycling purposes.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize that Thermosets set once and cannot be remelted.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Explain Epoxy Resin (two parts mix to harden).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Explain why thermosets are hard to recycle.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the use of thermosets in high-heat environments.
Compare brittle plastic with flexible plastic.
Analyze the role of Plasticizers (making PVC flexible).
Interpret the function of Fillers (bulking up).
Connect Flame Retardants to safety.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Compare making one thing (3D print) vs. making many (Moulding).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the draft angle needed for molds.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the Extrusion process (continuous profile).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Connect Blow Moulding to hollow objects (bottles).
Compare rotting wood with plastic.
Analyze the difference between Biodegradable and Compostable.
Interpret the timeline of plastic decomposition.
Connect oil extraction to plastic production.
Compare soft plastic (bag) with hard plastic (lego).
Analyze the properties of ABS (tough) vs. Acrylic (brittle).
Interpret the 'Plastic Memory' effect.
Connect heat to the pliability of thermoplastics.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Compare a plastic bottle (thermoplastic) with a boat hull (thermoset).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the cross-linking of polymer chains.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the heat resistance of thermosets.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Connect Urea Formaldehyde to electrical fittings.
Evaluate the health concerns of certain plasticizers (phthalates).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the cost-effectiveness of tooling for mass production.
Evaluate the viability of algae-based polymers.
Evaluate the thermal properties required for a specific application.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the brittleness vs. rigidity of thermosets.
Construct a material specification including necessary additives.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a mold design considering shrinkage and ejection.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Manufacturing Processes (vacuum forming, injection moulding, extrusion, 3D printing)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize design for manufacture (DFM) principles.
Construct a lifecycle analysis for a plastic product.
Construct a product design using the specific properties of Polypropylene (living hinge).
Synthesize molecular structure (long chains) with physical behavior.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a composite layup using resin.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Thermosetting Plastics (epoxy resin, melamine - heat resistant, rigid)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize chemical curing processes with manufacturing time.
Synthesize stewardship ethics with material selection.
Synthesize chemistry and material science.
